definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: price, hire (as that which is placed in front of one, presented, offered; As. maḫîru, price; maḫirânu, buyer, Dl:HWB 404, Prol.94);—´[[מ]] abs. Mic 3:11 + 9 t.; cstr. De 23:19 + 2 t.; sf. [[מְחִירָהּ]] Job 28:15; pl. sf. [[מְחִירֵיהֶם]] Ps 44:13; —

price, oft. [[בִּמְחִיר]] for a price; in trade 2Sa 24:24, 1Ki 10:28, 2Ch 1:16; cf. La 5:4 (‖[[כֶּסֶף]]), also (no [[בְּ]]) 1Ki 21:2 and [[שָׂדֶה עַתּוּדִים]] ´[[מ]] Pr 27:26; of wisdom Job 28:15 (‖[[סְגוֹר כֶּסֶף]]) cf. Pr 17:16 (no [[בְּ]]); fig. ´[[בְּלוֹא־בֶסֶף וּבְלוֹא מ]] 1Sa 55:1 in purchase of blessings fr. ´[[י]]; of price of people, fig. Ps 44:13, cf. Je 15:13.

hire, [[כֶּלֶב]] ´[[מ]] (i.e. of male prostitute) De 23:19 (‖[[אֶתְנַן זוֹנׇה]]) v. Di Dr; of venal priests Mic 3:11 (‖[[שׁׂחַד]]); = reward, gain, denied of Cyrus Is 45:13 (‖ id.); affirmed of Ant. Epiph. Da 11:39.
